description:
General Wolf uses a powerful chip to boost the power of the wolves and breaks through the iron gate of the sheep village. Inside the sheep village, the magical shield is activated in time and all the sheep are spared. In order to repel the attack of the powerful wolves, Slow Goat and Knife Goat set off with all the lambs to look for the maker of the magical shield - the sheep clan`s predecessor, Goat Gogo.
And the grey wolf who wants to get the credit is accidentally turned into a cute pet dog by the wolf general`s chip, in order to restore the original state, grey wolf had to agree to the wolf general`s request to do undercover as a puppy inside the sheep, cooperate with the other wolves to catch the sheep, and from then on began a period of thrilling and exciting between the wolves and the sheep of the hilarious journey.
source: bgm.tv/deepl

OTHER: 33:喜羊羊与灰太狼之羊村守护者

titles.title: Xi Yang Yang Yu Hui Tailang: Yang Cun Shouhuzhe
喜羊羊与灰太狼之羊村守护者
